optimization_recommendations: Consolidate inventory from underutilized bins BIN-A1-001 and BIN-A1-007 to improve space efficiency
Redistribute high-velocity items from overutilized bins to nearby medium-utilized bins
Consider splitting large SKUs in overutilized bins BIN-A1-012 and BIN-B2-008 across multiple locations
Implement dynamic slotting for seasonal items to balance utilization across zones
